Uses of Package
org.platanios.learn.optimization.linesearch

  • Packages that use org.platanios.learn.optimization.linesearch 
    Package Description
    org.platanios.learn.optimization  
    org.platanios.learn.optimization.linesearch  
  • Classes in org.platanios.learn.optimization.linesearch used by org.platanios.learn.optimization 
    Class and Description
    LineSearch
    Interface specifying the methods for which all classes implementing line search algorithms should have implementations.
  • Classes in org.platanios.learn.optimization.linesearch used by org.platanios.learn.optimization.linesearch 
    Class and Description
    IterativeLineSearch
    Abstract class that all iterative line search algorithms should extend.
    LineSearch
    Interface specifying the methods for which all classes implementing line search algorithms should have implementations.
    StepSizeInitializationMethod
    An enumeration of all possible step size initialization methods, used for computing the initial step size value for iterative line search algorithms, that are currently supported by our implementation.
